Question
========
How can AI tools be most helpful when you are learning R?

Answerlist
----------
* By writing full analyses for you so you never read the code
* By explaining snippets you don't understand and suggesting next steps
* By replacing the need to read any documentation
* By blocking you from running code until you pay

Solution
========
AI is most useful as an explainer and assistant: ask it to clarify code, propose approaches, and then verify the suggestions yourself.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* True
* False
* False
